name: Artistic Incarceration
description:
*Requires Full Screen for Dialogue Text*

A short demo of the first thing I ever created while learning Unity. Click now and you will receive complementary bugs and disappointment. Almost all the art and code was made by me (not an artist or programmer) .  Unfinished, but overall, some wacky ideas that may be fun to explore in the future. I'm posting this as more of a retrospective on my earliest work. :)
